text:
Hi all. I kindly need help adding custom line item properties (choices) I tried adding it on the backend. In design manager, I cloned an existing quote template that we use and added new line items. The problem is, these choices still dont show up in the actual quotes.. What am I missing?

I can see the options in the preview and when I'm doing the quotes, but if I click on next, it only pulls in the description of the product and not the values that I entered for the line item column properties. The third photo is the actual quote
Is it just me, or does the scope_css not always work as expected? I see no errors. When I scope using #{{name}} it works
Did you add the new choices to the related property in Products
Is it considered best practice to use require_css and require_css in the html + hubL section of modules or to put them in module.css/module.js?
